alert.note: Alert for Curry; Roosevelt (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 3:13PM MDT until July 07 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Roosevelt County in east central New Mexico... Southeastern Curry County in east central New Mexico... * Until 345 PM MDT. * At 312 PM MDT, outflow winds from strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Ranchvale to near Clovis to near Oasis State Park to 6 miles south of Portales. The outflow boundary was moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clovis, Portales, Farwell, Texico and Pleasant Hill. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 384 and 397. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Blowing dust associated with strong thunderstorm winds can reduce visibilities below one quarter mile at times.
